Row.Text: Gain 5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture for each [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] Urban Population of the Settlement when you construct a [icon:Action_Fortify] Fortification Building (Scales by Game Speed).

[BLIST][LI]Gain [B]5 [icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture[/B] for each [icon:YIELD_POPULATION] [B]Urban Population[/B] of the Settlement when you construct a [icon:Action_Fortify] [B]Fortification Building[/B] (Scales by Game Speed).[LI][B]+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production [/B]towards constructing the [B]Thành Huế[/B].[/LIST]
+30% [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production from being Đại Việt's associated [icon:WONDER] Wonder.
